summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Alley in Blocks 1 and 2, H.S. Turner's Interlaken Addition; all in The City of Seattle, all in accordance with Petition No. 81708 to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating Local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds", and declaring an emergency.
